result.reason: The request is a clear, actionable enhancement with maintainer buy-in and a specific expected behavior: auto-enable inheritance only for properties where child and parent already match.
result.approach: Add an Auto mode for the Inherit All field that compares each inheritable child value to its parent and toggles only matching inheritance flags, then add focused unit tests.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"The request is a clear, actionable enhancement with maintainer buy-in and a specific expected behavior: auto-enable inheritance only for properties where child and parent already match.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInfoInheritance.cs","mRemoteNG/Tools/MiscTools.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid/ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid.cs","mRemoteNGTests/Connection/ConnectionInfoInheritanceTests.cs"],"approach":"Add an Auto mode for the Inherit All field that compares each inheritable child value to its parent and toggles only matching inheritance flags, then add focused unit tests."}
